ID, CONTENT, TYPE, PARAMS_NUM paramsNum, STATUS, REMARK, CREATED_TIME createdTime, CREATED_USER_ID createdUserId, UPDATED_TIME updatedTime, UPDATED_USER_ID updatedUserId
mapper.insert:
select S_SMS_SEND_INFO.Nextval as id from dual
insert into SMS_SEND_INFO (ID, SEND_USER_ID, RE_NAME, RE_TEL, STORE_ADDRESS, MSG, STATUS, STATUS_DES, CREATED_USER_ID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER_ID,CLIENT_ID,SMS_TYPE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{smsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select a.id ID, a.client_name CLIENTNAME, a.tel CLIENTTEL, (select b.real_name from t_user b where b.user_id = a.sid) SALSEMAN, (select c.name from t_organ_company c where c.organ_id = a.companyid) ORGAN, decode((select min(d.status) from sms_send_info d where a.tel = d.re_tel), '', '未发送', '0', '已发送', '发送失败') SENDSTATUS, a.qdate QDATE from lm_client a where a.sex = '1'
and exists (select 1 from sms_send_info e where e.re_tel = a.tel and e.status='0')
and not exists (select 1 from sms_send_info e where e.re_tel = a.tel)
and exists (select 1 from sms_send_info s where s.re_tel = a.tel group by s.re_tel having min(s.status) >'0')
and a.client_name like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{clientName}, '%'))
and a.tel like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{clientTel}, '%'))
and a.qDate >= to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.qDate <= to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.companyid in (select f.organ_id from t_organ_company f where f.status = '1' start with f.organ_id = #{organId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by f.parent_id = prior f.organ_id) order by a.qdate desc

SELECT C.ID AS ID, C.CLIENT_NAME AS CLIENTNAME, C.TEL AS CLIENTTEL, S.MSG, (SELECT NAME FROM T_ORGAN_COMPANY WHERE ORGAN_ID = C.COMPANYID) AS ORGAN, DECODE(S.STATUS,'','未发送','0','已发送','发送失败') SENDSTATUS, C.QDATE AS QDATE FROM LM_CLIENT C LEFT JOIN SMS_SEND_INFO S ON C.ID = S.CLIENT_ID WHERE C.SEX = '1'
AND S.STATUS='0'
AND (S.STATUS IS NULL OR S.STATUS='')
AND S.STATUS>'0'
AND C.CLIENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{clientName}, '%'))
AND C.TEL LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{clientTel}, '%'))
AND (C.COMPANYID IN ( SELECT F.ORGAN_ID FROM T_ORGAN_COMPANY F WHERE F.STATUS = '1' START WITH F.ORGAN_ID = 1 CONNECT BY F.PARENT_ID = PRIOR F.ORGAN_ID ) or C.COMPANYID IS NULL) ORDER BY C.QDATE DESC
